testcase.brief: UDP Pkt is fragment after pass through vpn with NAT when size is beyond the threshould even if DF is set
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Set up one l3 vpn with NAT
Test Procedure: 1. Create l3 VPN tunnel in BR and CVG 2. Connect one laptop to the BR 3. Set the user-profile that is assigned to the laptop as Tunnel-all 4. Disable ip path-mtu-discovery CLI: no ip path-mtu-discovery enable 5. Send the UDP with 1500 ip size and set DF from BR to CVG, result 1 6. Send the UDP with 1500 ip size and set DF from CVG to BR, result 1 7. Send the UDP with 1358 ip size and set DF from BR to CVG, result 2 8. Send the UDP with 1358 ip size and set DF from CVG to BR, result 2 9. Send the UDP with 64 ip size and set DF from BR to CVG, result 2 10. Send the UDP with 64 ip size and set DF from CVG to BR, result 2

step.desc: config BR with WAN interface, nat enable
step.telnet: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}/${cvg1.cvg.wan.netmask}" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable" -v "interface eth0 mode wan nat"

step.desc: Show interface eth0 dhcp client to check if DNS server be obtained
config mgt0.1 with dhcp service enable,dns service enable
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable"

step.desc: Set interface eth0 to wan mode,eth1/eth2 to access mode and enable mac-learning
step.telnet: -v "user-profile lan1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable"

step.desc: BR check route
cvg1 check route
Disable ip path-mtu-discovery on BR
br1.vpc1 show ip address got from mgt0 dhcp client
get br1.vpc1 ip address
check ping
open debug switch
step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_ff id 2 src-ip ${cvg1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: no ip path-mtu-discovery enable and open debug on CVG
step.telnet: -v "no ip path-mtu-discovery enable" -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_ff id 2 src-ip ${cvg1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: Send the UDP with over 1370 size and set DF from BR to CVG,the udp packet will be fragmentation
show logging buffered
step.log-match: -i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore DF bit check, fragmentation anyway"

step.desc: Send the UDP with over 1370 size and set DF from CVG to BR,the udp packet will be fragmentation
show logging buffered
step.log-match: -i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore DF bit check, fragmentation anyway"

step.desc: Send the UDP with less 1370 size and set DF from BR to cvg,The pkt is not fragment
show logging buffered
step.log-match: -n -i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore DF bit check, fragmentation anyway"
-i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore pkt size check for tunnel"

step.desc: Send the UDP with 1358 ip size and set DF from CVG to BR,The pkt is not fragment
show logging buffered on CVG
step.log-match: -n -i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore DF bit check, fragmentation anyway"
-i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore pkt size check for tunnel"

step.desc: Send the UDP with 64 ip size and set DF from BR to CVG,The pkt is not fragment
show logging buffered
step.log-match: -n -i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore DF bit check, fragmentation anyway"
-i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore pkt size check for tunnel"

step.desc: Send the UDP with 64 ip size and set DF from CVG to BR,The pkt is not fragment
show logging buffered on CVG
step.log-match: -n -i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore DF bit check, fragmentation anyway"
-i "Path MTU Discovery disable, ignore pkt size check for tunnel"
